statements: SELECT course_id, course_name FROM course_materials;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_id, course_name, created_date FROM course_materials ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, material_url FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, created_date FROM course_materials WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_materials WHERE instructor_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM course_materials ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses FROM course_materials GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT course_id, course_name, material_url FROM course_materials WHERE material_url IS NOT NULL AND instructor_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM CourseMaterials;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM CourseMaterials ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_type FROM CourseFiles WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT file_id, course_id, file_name, file_type, file_path FROM CourseFiles WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id > 1 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_name LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, course_level FROM Courses WHERE course_level > 100;
SELECT course_name, course_description, course_level FROM Courses WHERE course_level = 200;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM Courses JOIN Materials ON Courses.course_id = Materials.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_course_id = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_level = 1 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_level FROM Courses WHERE course_level > 2 AND course_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, student_email, course_name FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.student_course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM Materials WHERE course_id = 'd82f7754-58a9-4d12-a681-f4f583b7a2d7';
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_students, course_name FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.student_course_id = Courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Course;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM Course WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Material WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, file_type FROM Material WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Course WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, file_type FROM Material JOIN Course ON Material.course_id = Course.course_id;
SELECT topic_name, description FROM Topic WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM Assignment WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM Material WHERE course_id = 3 ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT chapter_title FROM Chapter WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY chapter_id ASC;
SELECT lesson_title, chapter_id FROM Lesson WHERE chapter_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course WHERE course_name LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT c.course_id, c.course_name, m.material_name FROM Course c JOIN Material m ON c.course_id = m.course_id ORDER BY c.course_id ASC, m.material_id DESC;
SELECT l.lesson_id, l.lesson_title, r.resource_name FROM Lesson l JOIN Resource r ON l.lesson_id = r.lesson_id WHERE l.chapter_id = 2 ORDER BY r.resource_id ASC;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM Course c JOIN Material m ON c.course_id = m.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING total_materials > 5 ORDER BY total_materials DESC;
